channel.title: Commands
channel.description:
hi
i need 2 commands.....
1. ::master command 2. mute command
If you have can you please say it
---Xtrascape-4ever---

item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @Gh0stb4rr4g3 Gh0stb4rr4g3
item.description:
@Gh0stb4rr4g3 wrote:

Can[quote=“MistaBigBoss, post:2, topic:228978”]master: if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“master”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addSkillXP(14910000, 0);
addSkillXP(14910000, 1);
addSkillXP(14910000, 2);
addSkillXP(14910000, 3);
addSkillXP(14910000, 4);
addSkillXP(14910000, 5);
addSkillXP(14910000, 6);
addSkillXP(14910000, 7);
addSkillXP(14910000, 8);
addSkillXP(14910000, 9);
addSkillXP(14910000, 10);
addSkillXP(14910000, 11);
addSkillXP(14910000, 12);
addSkillXP(14910000, 13);
addSkillXP(14910000, 14);
addSkillXP(14910000, 15);
addSkillXP(14910000, 16);
addSkillXP(14910000, 17);
addSkillXP(14910000, 18);
addSkillXP(14910000, 19);
addSkillXP(14910000, 20);
addSkillXP(14910000, 21);
addSkillXP(14910000, 22);
addSkillXP(14910000, 23);
sendMessage(""+ playerName +" … your a nerd.");
}

    } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("mute")
            && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Vreg")) {
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
                + " tried to cheat and has been autobanned!");
        appendToBanned(playerName);
        disconnected = true;[/quote]

Can’t you use “Codes” ?

Maybe delete the ban thing.

And btw.

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("mute") && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Vreg")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " tried to cheat and has been autobanned!"); appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = true;

Change the name “Vreg” To your name in your server because only the name in the “” Can use that command.

@Mister boss don’t your forgot the }

at the end ?

Read full topic

item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:

master: if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“master”) && playerRights >= 2)
{

    } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("mute")
            && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Vreg")) {
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
                + " tried to cheat and has been autobanned!");
        appendToBanned(playerName);
        disconnected = true;
